name: Tile Wars
description:
Tile Wars is a small game developed by me, Areshu. Is a game with simple rules:

  • Your objective is to remain the last on the platform.
  • You can move along the platform jumping from one tile to another.
  • Each time that a character leaves a tile this colapse and fall, leaving a hole in the platform.
  • You have to move to run away from the others pinky bad slimes. You are the blue, good slime by the way.
  • As you move, you break the platform and make it smaller, making easier that the other bad slimes fall into the lava pit before you do.
  • When you win a round, you can pass to the next. Each round will be a little more difficult that the previous one , in other words, more challenging.

Controls:

  • You can move using the Arrow Keys.
  • You can close the game by pressing the Escape Key.
  • You can use the mouse to click in the Interface Buttons.

This is my first completed game by myself, so, even though it's not perfect, it's  finished! (this really is an achievement for a solo gamedev while working a full time job). It's playable, fun and free!! So don't be lazy, download it, play it and give me some feedback about it.  Thank you for that.
